This game is great, but you are better off buying Left 4 Dead 2 (unless you got this in a bundle) for several reasons:
- All of the content from this game is in the sequel.
- L4D2 has workshop support while this game only has an ample amount of mods.
- There are a lot more people playing L4D2 than this game, so it might be hard finding a match with this game.
- And much more...

Again, this game is great, but everything that this game has to offer is included in Left 4 Dead 2.
Still the better of the two.

Хто не грав, обов'язково зіграйте.

At first, I really didn't like this game because I was so used to L4D2.
Today? It's in my favourites.
The gameplay is good, even better if you've got friends to play with.
It's of course kinda dead since you know.. It was released 12 years ago.
You can still find games though.
I highly recommend this game.

Очень крутая игра, Я прошел все главы на высоком уровне, и это действительно не пустая трата времени.
НАИПРИЯТНЕЙШАЯ механика стрельбы, даже сейчас, вспоминая о ней, я так балдею...
Зомби тема заежженая, но ПвЕ игры мне очень даже нравятся. 
Идем от А до Б, главное всем выжить, очень простая цель в игре.
Персонажи тут сильно не проявились бы, но на прохождении игры можно было понять, кто трус, а кто девка(хаха, вот это шутка).
Мутанты тут на уровне, обычные зомбарюги могут наскучать, а ты попробуй против танков с пилой? а а а?
Все-таки советую. Ну ради не для этого же интернет подключал?

This game is buggy but absolutely fantastic to play with friends. The bugs even enhance the gameplay at times, creating a silly atmosphere and the illusion of mods. The campaigns are original and have still have a classic feel after all this time. I'd recommend Left 4 Dead to any friends looking to have a casual gameplay session.

Left 4 Dead is evil. It's gaming experience is dark, viserally frightening and frequently so intense that it will have you looking over your shoulder just to confirm there isn't a zombie behind you.

That is why it is so incredibly awesome!

So, without any further delay here are my top 10 reasons for why you should definitely buy Left 4 Dead:

1. The survivor characters are well thought out and very relatable.
2. The game has excellent replayability, even in campaign mode.
3. The achievements are carefully crafted, challenging and completely addictive.
4. It does what a zombie game should do: scare the crap out of you.
5. Multi-player is encouraged, rewarding but not always necessary.
6. The varying difficulty levels actually make a difference (just look at my hours on expert)
7. You can play as special infected in multiplayer mode!
8. The level and campaign design is amazing.
9. It's one of the best zombie FPS games ever.
10. It's just so much bloody fun!

My only criticism is that sometimes the available weaponry options feel restricted and limited, but that just adds to the challenge.

You don't just play Left 4 Dead, you experience Left 4 Dead.

So experience it today!

It’s a good classic, however Left 4 Dead 2 is probably a better option. The 2nd game includes everything from this game and so much more. If you’d rather just play a cheaper option, without mods and a somewhat easier experience, this game may be the better option.

Also the servers are pretty dead in this game.
